alert.note: Alert for Wadena (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 10 at 1:36PM CDT until July 10 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN HUBBARD...NORTHWESTERN WADENA AND SOUTHEASTERN BECKER COUNTIES... At 135 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Osage, or 30 miles east of Detroit Lakes, moving east at 30 mph. At 133 PM CDT, broadcast media reported ping pong ball sized hail near Osage and Snellman. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Broadcast media. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Park Rapids, Menahga, Hubbard and Huntersville. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
